name: drawUnderline(forGlyphRange:underlineType:baselineOffset:lineFragmentRect:lineFragmentGlyphRange:containerOrigin:)
desc: Draws underlining for the glyphs in a specified range.
declaration:
func drawUnderline(forGlyphRange glyphRange: NSRange, 
     underlineType underlineVal: NSUnderlineStyle, 
    baselineOffset: CGFloat, 
  lineFragmentRect lineRect: CGRect, 
lineFragmentGlyphRange lineGlyphRange: NSRange, 
   containerOrigin: CGPoint)
